snippet: Anthony Davis had 21 points and 9 rebounds, Kenneth Faried added 15 points and 11 rebounds, and the United States remained unbeaten at the Basketball World Cup by beating winless New Zealand.
abstract: Sports Briefing; United States team remains unbeaten after defeating New Zealand, 98-71, at the Basketball World Cup; other sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis had 21 points and 9 rebounds, Kenneth Faried added 15 points and 11 rebounds, and the United States remained unbeaten at the Basketball World Cup by beating winless New Zealand.
